evidence.claim: Norwalt utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure.
The company supports HIPAA compliance in their health technology solutions.
Norwalt integrates EDI for health data exchange.
Their platform supports FHIR for electronic health records integration.
GCP is a part of their data processing strategy.
